title: Sesame Chicken Wraps
ingredients: ¾ pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into strips
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Toss in chicken, sesame seeds, garlic salt, and pepper; cook and stir in hot oil until no longer pink, 3 to 4 minutes. Add broccoli, onion, and ginger. Cook until vegetables are tender and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine sugar, peanut butter, soy sauce, water, and garlic in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Cook sauce, stirring frequently, until sugar is dissolved, about 3 minutes.
Assemble the wraps using the tortillas, chicken-broccoli mixture, cooked rice, and peanut sauce.
nutrition: 494 calories; protein 23.9g; carbohydrates 63.9g; fat 16.3g; cholesterol 32.3mg; sodium 1141.1mg. Full Nutrition
